text: Quentin LaMar Cook (born September 8, 1940) is an American religious leader and former lawyer and business executive. He has been a member of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) since 2007. Cook was born in Logan, Utah. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Utah Category:Businesspeople from Utah Category:People from Logan, Utah
title: Quentin L. Cook
